AddressInfo.Title: Casa Sirino
AddressInfo.AccessComments: Between Lagonegro and Lago Sirino on the SS19, turn west on the Contrada Sirino and follow the road downhill for 500m where there is a hidden turn to the left down a half made up lane. This is quite steep. Continue down till you see some green gates. Stop and phone the number below, or ring the bell on the gate. Ideally phone in advance, to avoid a wasted visit.

GeneralComments: The charging station is situated at our log cabin which we make available to friends and guests. It is self-contained and has a stunning view over the valley. If you wish to combine an overnight charge with a comfortable bed and full facilities, then we can come to an arrangement - provided it isn't already occupied!
